mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USERID, USERNAME, PHONE, ZIP, ADDRESS, DETAILADDRESS, EMAIL, RECEIVEEMAIL, AUTH) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{zip}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{email}, #{receiveEmail}, #{auth})
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET USERNAME = #{userName}, PHONE = #{phone}, ZIP = #{zip}, ADDRESS = #{address}, DETAILADDRESS = #{detailAddress}, EMAIL = #{email}, RECEIVEEMAIL = #{receiveEmail}, AUTH = #{auth} WHERE USERID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM DELIVERY WHERE id = #{id} AND userId = #{userId}
